name: modmar
description:
modmar is a full service marketing, media, and event consulting firm with a passion for using the latest digital tools to market and promote your business.
We specialize in companies with complex products and services that are late to take the leap into the digital world. Â We want to be your marketing department and our unique team of professionals will change your view of marketing. We believe that our clients invest in modmar and we invest in their business.
